channel.title: Staff only
channel.description:
well i got some customs but i want it so only staff can wear them.
eg
when a non staff tries to put on it says sorry you have to be staff to wear this.
and only staff can wear it

item.title: Staff only
item.dc:creator: @adrian1372 adrian1372
item.description:
@adrian1372 wrote:

If you are using Delta, search for:

if(wearID == 6570 && killedJad == 0){ sM("You must have defeated TzTok-Jad to wear this cape."); return false; }
In client . Java. You then add this nder that:

If(wearID == (The custom item's ID) && playerRights = 0 sM("Sorry, you have to be staff to wear this."); return false; }

so it should look like this:

if(wearID == 6570 && killedJad == 0){ sM("You must have defeated TzTok-Jad to wear this cape."); return false; } If(wearID == (The custom item's ID) && playerRights = 0 sM("Sorry, you have to be staff to wear this."); return false; }

Make sure you replace (The custom item’s ID) with ur item’s id. An example for an ID would be 35. Which is Armadyl Godsword in Delta sources.

And no, i am not playing good at this. I have made 30 donator and staff only items.

Then again, you search in Client.Java or Client or Client.txt or whatever ur’s r called. Normal is client.java.

Read full topic

item.title: Staff only
item.dc:creator: @wonderspring wonderspring
item.description:
@wonderspring wrote:

if(wearID == ITEMID && playerRights < 1){
sM(“You need to be a staff to wear this.”);
return false;
}
